channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bed slats left here, 17th January
item.description:
Bed slats perhaps left for refuse collection but not in a bin so not collected.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Blithdale Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Oven and hob dumped on pavement, 17th January
item.description:
Old hob and oven dumped in front of 48 Brampton Road. I think it’s been done by the owners but they refuse to answer their door or talk to me (they are Chinese). I understand that people put stuff out but it should be on there drive and on top of that it’s been there for a month now so unlikely someone will take it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brampton Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Council bin bag full of poo, 17th January
item.description:
Council waste bin bag left in street, foxes have opened it now all the poo bags inside are spilling out - really toxic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farquhar Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drug taking and gas sniffing paraphernalia abandoned the pavement, 17th January
item.description:
A group of people in a car left drug taking and gas sniffing paraphernalia on the pavement. There is an explosive hazard, trip hazard, fly tipping hazards and unknown risks from the contents of the box.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Warwick Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Discarded gas canisters, 17th January
item.description:
Discarded gas canisters have been there for over a month. I have reported the issue twice - bromley council mark it 'fixed' but have taken no action, which is poor. These have clearly been used for recreational drug use, and there are children living in this area. Please remove them and keep our area safe.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Dargate Close, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Blithdale Road, Abbey Wood

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brookdene Road, Plumstead

item.title: Litter and mud, 17th January
item.description:
I reported the litter issue a few weeks ago but you emailed saying this has been resolved, but the same litter is still there and its got worse all along Welling Way. Also due to SGN doing works and also private building along from Sherwood Ave towards Bellegrove Road part of Welling Way there is alot on mud across the pavement and with the rain is very slippery and dangerous. This needs to address as soon as possible or someone will have an accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 64, Welling Way, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Church Manorway, Abbey Wood

item.title: Uneven footpath, 17th January
item.description:
Walking along Auckland hill with a pushchair which tipped over due to uneven footpath. Several paving slabs are extremely raised. Very lucky child wasn’t seriously hurt.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Auckland Hill, West Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
